boundary_rationales.network_call: Ops and environment validators still perform constrained network probes while boundary adapters are migrated.
boundary_rationales.os_environ_access: Environment guard and runtime adapters still normalize process env access centrally.
boundary_rationales.path_write_call: Legacy generators and report writers are being migrated to core runtime write boundaries.
boundary_rationales.subprocess_call: Selected legacy checks and command wrappers still rely on subprocess while they are refactored to shared runners.
